Detailed Description

This class is responsible for representing clients in a generic way.

Member Function Documentation

void CGenericClientListCtrl::AddSource ( CKnownFile *  owner,
const CClientRef &  source,
SourceItemType  type 
)

Adds a source belonging to the specified file.

Parameters:
owner The owner of this specific source-entry, must be a valid pointer.
source The client object to be added, must be a valid pointer.
type If the source is a current source, or a A4AF source.

Please note that the specified client will only be added to the list if it's owner is shown, otherwise the source will simply be ignored. Duplicates wont be added.

References m_knownfiles, m_ListItems, and ShowSourcesCount().

Removes a source from the list.

Parameters:

void CGenericClientListCtrl::ShowSources ( const CKnownFileVector &  files  ) 

Shows the clients of specific files.

Parameters:
file A valid, sorted vector of files whose clients will be shown.

WARNING: The received vector *MUST* be odered with std::sort.

References m_knownfiles, m_ListItems, SetShowSources(), ShowSourcesCount(), and CMuleListCtrl::SortList().

Referenced by CSharedFilesWnd::SelectionUpdated().

int CGenericClientListCtrl::SortProc ( wxUIntPtr  item1,
wxUIntPtr  item2,
long  sortData 
) [static, protected]

Wrapper around the user-provided sorter function.

This function ensures that items are sorted in the order specified by clicking on column-headers, and also enforces that different entries are never considered equal. This is required for lists that make use of child-items, since otherwise, parents may not end up properly located in relation to child-items.

Reimplemented from CMuleListCtrl.

References CMuleListCtrl::COLUMN_MASK, and CMuleListCtrl::SORT_DES.

Member Data Documentation

ListItems CGenericClientListCtrl::m_ListItems [private]

This list contains everything shown on the list.

Sources are only to be found on this list if they are being displayed

Referenced by AddSource(), RemoveSource(), ShowSources(), UpdateItem(), and ~CGenericClientListCtrl().
